Uses of Class
org.daisy.common.messaging.Message

  • Packages that use Message 
    Package Description
    org.daisy.common.messaging  

    • Uses of Message in org.daisy.common.messaging

      Subclasses of Message in org.daisy.common.messaging 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProgressMessage
      A progress message is an extension of a simple message, with a certain "progress" and with possible nested (progress) messages.
      Methods in org.daisy.common.messaging that return types with arguments of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Iterable<Message> MessageBus.allMessages() 
      protected abstract Iterable<Message> AbstractMessageAccessor.allMessages()
      Must return a (mutable) iterable that contains all messages (which are mutable) received up till now.
      abstract List<Message> MessageAccessor.getAll()
      Gets the messgages from a set of levels
      List<Message> AbstractMessageAccessor.getAll() 
      List<Message> MessageAccessor.getDebugs()
      Gets the debugs.
      List<Message> MessageAccessor.getErrors()
      Gets the errors.
      List<Message> MessageAccessor.getInfos()
      Gets the infos.
      List<Message> MessageAccessor.MessageFilter.getMessages() 
      List<Message> ProgressMessage.getMessages()
      If this message has text, returns a singleton list with an immutable copy of the message.
      List<Message> MessageAccessor.getTraces()
      Gets the traces.
      List<Message> MessageAccessor.getWarnings()
      Gets the warnings.
